text.en:
All Insect, Plant, and Reptile monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF, also all other monsters on the field lose 300 ATK/DEF. You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Add 1 "Raika" monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 of your "Raika" monsters that is banished, or in your hand or GY, in Defense Position.
You can only use this effect of "Raika Ryouran Kuruisaki" once per turn.
